heroes.name: KNULL
heroes.description: The god of the abyss from the beginning of time, Knull has warred against the light, creating the Symbiotes to further his cause.

heroes.name: DAREDEVIL
heroes.description: Blinded in a childhood accident, attorney-at-law Matt Murdock protects Hell’s Kitchen as the masked vigilante, Daredevil.

heroes.name: SPIDER-MAN
heroes.description: With amazing spider-like abilities, teenage science whiz Peter Parker fights crime and dreams of becoming an Avenger as Spider-Man.

heroes.name: DOC OCK
heroes.description: Brilliant scientist and perennial foe of Spider-Man, Dr. Otto Octavius AKA Doc Ock must learn to free his mind from his tentacles in order to regain control.

heroes.name: TASKMASTER
heroes.description: Taskmaster is a masked assassin who carries out deadly missions on behalf of the Red Room.

heroes.name: AGENT ZERO
heroes.description: Program’s covert operations unit Team X, changed his name to David North, and took the codename Maverick.
